Text:
As the sun sets, No. 666 and the group make their way
to the meeting point at Fort First's castle wall.
The castle itself seems mostly unscathed.
Despite the main street being in a terrible state...
There you are.

Turning towards the voice, there sits a woman with
strawberry-colored hair.

Illuminated in the moonlight as she is, even a fellow
girl like Rose can see how sublimely beautiful she
is.
She's the Shadow Garden's No. 559.
What are the details of the mission?
We were just told that it would involve Fort First.
...Come.

Two days ago, Fort First fell into the Perv Faction's
hands. It's supposed to be a small fortress near the
Midgar border with little strategic value...

But the important part is that the Cult secretly
mobilized the Children of Diablos to take it.
*gasp*

Our job is to sneak in and find out what the Cult is
after.

I take it you know why you were chosen for the
mission?
...Because I already know the fort's layout.

The royal family uses it as a vacation home to escape
the summer's heatâ€”correct?
...Yes.
That's part of it. But not all.
I was the one who nominated you.
Rose Oriana.
...Huh?

Rose falters for a moment at being called by her real
name.

Among the Shadow Garden's ranks, the identity of
No. 666 as Rose Oriana is something of an open
secret.
Master Shadow directly granted you power.
Whaaat?!
You were granted such an honor...?
Y-Yes... Weren't you two as well?
We were guided here by the Seven Shadows.

That goes for most in the Shadow Garden. The only
ones granted power by Shadow himself were the initial
Seven Shadows...
And me.
*gasp*

Master Shadow granted me strength, just as he did to
you.
...You too.

Aside from the Seven Shadows, you and I are the only
two to have received that privilege. And yet...
So weak.

As Master Shadow's faithful servant, it's my duty to
purge any who are unworthy of his grace.
They're on the move.
There's more than I expected.
There's something ahead.

These are historical ruins. They are said to be a
shrine memorializing those who fought in the
battle against Diablos...

But these days, they are used as an outdoor music
hall...
...Ruins, huh.
Follow them from a distance.

No. 559 takes the lead, and the four of them head
through the darkness.

Before long, they arrive at the ruins. Rose and the
others watch them quietly from behind cover.
That's Kouadoi the Gale...one of the Cult's leaders!

...Those surrounding him are probably all First
Children.

The First Children are the strongest forces the Cult
has, and there aren't all that many of them. Having
so many all in the same place is a highly unusual
occurrence.
We are ready, sir.
At long last.

At the altar of the ruins, there is a device with a
slot designed to fit something.

Kouadoi approaches the device and takes out a
flat object.
It can't be...
Rose has seen something similar before.

It resembles a device she has seen before in the
ruins of the Sanctuary.

The moment Kouadoi inserts the flat object into the
device, countless lines appear on the altar.
Shortly after, the altar is enveloped in light.
I knew it... It's just like in the Sanctuary!
Now, come forth.

A woman appears from the crowd of black robes and
begins walking towards the altar.
*gasp*
M-Mother...?!
No, why...?
If she's your mother...doesn't that mean...
She's Queen Reina Oriana. Whoaâ€”
Shh!
Come, put your hand there.

As Queen Reina follows Kouadoi's order, the device
on the altar begins to move.
Just as we thought... Royal blood is the key...

This is the legendary protection of the hero
Freja...!
Get ready to fight.
Huh?!
B-But this was supposed to be a recon mission!

That ring is the key. We need to wipe them out and
retrieve it.
What's this "key"...?
That's need-to-know.

All you should be thinking about is how we can
retrieve it.
Please, wait! That's my mother...!
So?

Rose's plea falls on deaf ears as No. 559 leaps high
into the air.
Who goes there...?!
It's execution time.
Huh...?
*gasp*
Why?
Why attack my mother?!
